name: Web Sport
descriptionEn: Website which consists of laying out a webpage replicating the Zeplin's given design.

name: kISI || Web Contacto
descriptionEn: Group project that consisted of developing a responsive website that would serve as a presentation of our group from a given design. The homepage features a user-friendly design and complete with links to various sections of the site itself.

name: Guess the number
descriptionEn: Web game where you have to guess the randomly generated number based on some clues while playing..

name: Create business cards
descriptionEn: Project for the creation of online business cards. Website developed by a team of Adalab students as part of a group project. It features a platform with interactive functions to create your own business cards and share them.

name: Buscador de Cocktails
descriptionEn: Cocktail website that consists of searching, filtering and adding or removing your favourite cocktail.

name: Friend's phrases
descriptionEn: Website which has Friend's quotes which you can filter by character or by sentence. In addition, users can add new phrases and its characters.

name: Harry Potter
descriptionEn: Website to search for characters from the Harry Potter Saga. Users can filter according to different criteria and can also view the details page of each character..

name: Cool Projects Station
descriptionEn: This project is designed for the creation of business cards for each project and its authors. The cards are digitally created, stored in the library and can be shared..
AdditionalDescription: Can be shared through a link generated automatically by our website.This gives the users the opportunity to present their projects, share information about them and advertise them to a wide audience. Full-stack project.

name: Portfolio
descriptionEn: Personal project with information and data related to all the projects.
